active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a mid-sized company handling sensitive customer data, debate the trade-offs between implementing strict Separation of Duties (SoD) in privileged access provisioning versus operational efficiency. What real-world examples from NIST SP 800-53r5 or SOX compliance illustrate potential fraud risks if SoD is ignored? Categorize scenarios where SoD is essential versus optional. (Encourages critical thinking, addresses misconceptions that SoD is only financial, and promotes compare/contrast.)
active_learning.peer_teaching: Pair up and use the teach-back method: Student A explains core SoD concepts (e.g., conflict of interest prevention per NIST AC-5) with a non-example (single admin handling access requests and audits), then Student B rephrases and provides an example from asset provisioning. Switch roles. (Enhances understanding through explanation and active recall.)
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a real-world scenario of a healthcare organization's identity provisioning process, groups must map roles to prevent any single person from requesting, approving, and implementing privileged access. Use NIST SP 800-53r5 AC-5 as a guide; identify violations and redesign with a SoD matrix. Present solutions. (Applies concepts practically with high real-world relevance.)

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in CISSP-aligned content. Topic: Separation of Duties Implementation (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Asset Security > Asset Provisioning > Identity and Access Provisioning > Privileged Access Provisioning > Separation of Duties Implementation). Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning Objectives: [Insert full learning_objectives array here] - Active Learning: Use to inspire scenario-based cards (e.g., discussion trade-offs, peer teach-backs, healthcare problem-solving). - Scaffolding: Distribute cards across layers (tag each: Layer1_Foundation, etc.), build prior knowledge links. - Big Picture: Emphasize insider threat reduction, NIST AC-5, SOX compliance. Generate flashcards following this exact schema: [Insert full flashcard_schema here] Output ONLY a JSON array of flashcards, each as: {"type": "MCQ|Basic|Cloze", "front": "...", "back": "...", "explanation": "...", "bloom_level": "REMEMBER", "layer": "layer1_foundation", "reference": "NIST SP 800-53r5 AC-5"}. Ensure progressive complexity, web-grounded (NIST sources), voter-approved content (e.g., matrices, SOX IT controls). No extra text.
